Institution Name: A.D. RUFAI COL. FOR LEGAL AND ISLAMIC STUDIES (AFF TO BAYERO UNI), BAUCHI STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arabic and any other Arts subject.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Arabic and three (3) other relevant subjects.
Subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts and/or Social Sciences.

Institution Name: A.D. RUFAI COL. FOR LEGAL AND ISLAMIC STUDIES (AFF TO BAYERO UNI), BAUCHI STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes to include Islamic Studies.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Islamic Studies or Arabic and any three (3) relevant subjects.
Subjects: Islamic Studies plus two (2) other Arts subjects.
